name: Establishes Temporal Properties
description: Establishes the algebraic properties that govern how the time operator functions within the Universal Object Reference framework.
subject: urn:uor:resource:time-operator-formalism
contextualDescription: The Time Operator Formalism establishes the essential algebraic properties of the time operator, including composition, identity, inverses, and commutation relations, which ensure consistent temporal evolution while preserving coherence structures.
